001package net.tvburger.jdl.common.numbers;
002
003import java.util.Arrays;
004import java.util.Comparator;
005
006public final class DoubleSupport implements JavaNumberTypeSupport<Double> {
007
008    protected DoubleSupport() {
009    }
010
011    @Override
012    public String name() {
013        return "Double Precision";
014    }
015
016    @Override
017    public Double[] createArray(int length) {
018        Double[] doubles = new Double[length];
019        Arrays.fill(doubles, 0.0);
020        return doubles;
021    }
022
023    @Override
024    public Double[][] createArrayOfArrays(int rows, int columns) {
025        Double[][] doubles = new Double[rows][columns];
026        for (Double[] array : doubles) {
027            Arrays.fill(array, 0.0);
028        }
029        return doubles;
030    }
031
032    @Override
033    public Double multiply(Double first, Double second) {
034        return first * second;
035    }
036
037    @Override
038    public Double multiply(Double first, int second) {
039        return first * second;
040    }
041
042    @Override
043    public Double divide(Double first, Double second) {
044        return first / second;
045    }
046
047    @Override
048    public Double divide(Double first, int second) {
049        return first / second;
050    }
051
052    @Override
053    public Double add(Double first, Double second) {
054        return first + second;
055    }
056
057    @Override
058    public Double add(Double first, int second) {
059        return first + second;
060    }
061
062    @Override
063    public Double minusOne() {
064        return -1.0;
065    }
066
067    @Override
068    public Double one() {
069        return 1.0;
070    }
071
072    @Override
073    public Double zero() {
074        return 0.0;
075    }
076
077    @Override
078    public boolean equals(Double first, Double second) {
079        double diff = first - second;
080        return -1.0e-10 <= diff && diff <= 1.0e-10;
081    }
082
083    @Override
084    public boolean isGreaterThan(Double first, Double second) {
085        return first > second;
086    }
087
088    @Override
089    public Double squareRoot(Double value) {
090        return Math.sqrt(value);
091    }
092
093    @Override
094    public Double absolute(Double value) {
095        return Math.abs(value);
096    }
097
098    @Override
099    public Double valueOf(double value) {
100        return value;
101    }
102
103    @Override
104    public Comparator<Double> comparator() {
105        return Double::compare;
106    }
107
108    @Override
109    public Double clamp01(Double value) {
110        if (value <= zero()) {
111            return zero();
112        }
113        if (value >= one()) {
114            return one();
115        }
116        return value;
117    }
118
119    @Override
120    public Double epsilon() {
121        return 1e-16;
122    }
123
124    @Override
125    public Double log(Double value) {
126        return Math.log(value);
127    }
128
129    @Override
130    public Double pow(Double base, int times) {
131        return Math.pow(base, times);
132    }
133
134    @Override
135    public boolean isInstance(Object value) {
136        return value instanceof Double;
137    }
138}
